name: Animal Sort Game
description:
There are 10 different animals and you have to put them in the right place!
(More Animals will be added in future updates!)

Do you know all of the animals in our game?
- Elephant
- Giraffe
- Hippo
- Monkey
- Panda
- Parrot
- Penguin
- Pig
- Rabbit
- Snake

Our game has no Advertisements or Microtransactions!
